content: Avoid making a mess when you’re painting your home by getting the job done with this drip-free paint roller. Simply fill the roller’s hollow interior with your chosen paint, and the patented distribution system ensures an even coat with every roll.

Do we even need to elaborate here on why you need to buy this for your pup? It’s a giant tennis ball. Look at this friggin’ dog – he looks like he found his soulmate. Its got a 9.5″ circumference, so it’s a great gift for even the largest of breeds.

Give your lawn ornaments something to smile about by placing this voluptuous stripper garden gnome on your quaint yard’s main stage. Crafted from weather-proof resin, this curvy vixen is dressed in her skimpiest ensemble as she swings wildly on her pole.

Declare war on your fellow cubicle mates by launching annoying little projectiles at them using this toothpick crossbow. It measures just under five inches long – making it the ideal size for firing small projectiles like toothpicks and Q-tips.

Liven up your morning routine with a little caffeine and clever wordplay by sipping your brew from this “for fox sake” coffee mug. This high quality ceramic mug comes with the witty design printed on both sides and is available in either an 11 or 15 ounce size.

Transform any part of your home into an impromptu guestroom using this comfy convertible bean bag chair. It comes filled with super soft shredded foam and can be easily stretched out into a full size bed that is large enough to accommodate two adults.

One up that hipster writing his avant-garde novel using a feather and scroll by candle light by using the Bluetooth typewriter keyboard. It features an old school design that simulates the tactile clicky feel of a vintage typewriter so you can write in style.

titleEN: What The Fuck Should I Make For Dinner
content: Don’t know what to make for dinner? No worries! The “What The Fuck Should I Make For Dinner?” gets everyone off their asses and into the kitchen. You’ll be able to whip up any fucking dish you wish like a goddamn pro by following the profanity laden recipes.

Carry an entire band’s worth of equipment in the palm of your hands by toting around the electronic multi-instrument. This unique musical gadget allows for a new type of musical experience focused on exploration and creativity rather than skill sets and signal chains.

Transport yourself to a placid world where stress melts away when you activate this planetarium light in your bathtub. Simply place it at the side of the tub and watch in amazement as it projects dozens of beautiful stars onto your walls.

Let Nessie keep you company as you prepare your delicious meals by stirring the pot with the Loch Ness monster soup scoop. Nessie’s elongated neck pokes out through the surface while the ample wide body serves as the ideal serving utensil.

titleEN: Back To The Future Light Up Shoes
content: Stay ahead of fashion curve by accessorizing your futuristic get-up with the Back To The Future light up shoes. With 2015 fast approaching, these light up shoes will help you stay trendy as you shred on your brand new hoverboard.

Give any would be attacker the shock of a lifetime by defending yourself with the stun gun walking stick. This seemingly inconspicuous cane features an ultra bright LED flashlight along with a million volt stun gun tip that’ll stop any attacker dead in his tracks.

Send a clear message to unwanted visitors and solicitors by greeting them with this “go away” doormat. Made of natural coconut fibers, this 16 x 27 inch mat sports the blunt and succinct message warning visitors to stay away from your humble abode.

If you have a problem that needs fixing but don’t know where to start, leave it to the Mr. Meeseeks dice and dare game. Players take turns drawing request cards, then roll the dice to see if the request if completed, if not they have to perform embarrassing dares.

Have loads of 90s styled high tech fun with the talkboy tape recorder from Tiger. Armed with a blank cassette and the speed recorder setting that lets you change your voice, you’ll be able to pull off all kinds of pranks on friends and family.

Enjoy a coffee-house quality cup of Joe from the comfort of home by signing up for this gourmet coffee subscription box. Each month you’ll receive a carefully curated package containing four 1.8 ounce bags of premium coffee from Seattle’s top-rated roasters.

See if you have what it takes to become the ultimate champion by facing off against your friends on this Battlebots arena playset. The game board folds out to create a small arena where you can go head to head in merciless robotic warfare!

Assess potential threats inside an unknown home by giving it a quick once over using this reverse peephole viewer. By placing it over the peephole you’ll be able to scope out the place so that you know what you’re getting yourself into.

Start your morning off right – with a penis in your mouth! With these naughty penis shaped egg frying molds you’ll be cooking up a protein storm of phallic shaped meals that will kickstart your metabolism and become a staple of your nutritious morning breakfast.

Avoid canine obesity by promoting healthy eating habits for your pup using this slow feed dog bowl. Made from food-safe ABS plastic, the bowl features a series of ridges designed to extend the time it takes for your hungry pooch to devour his food.

Enjoy a hot meal when you’re out roughing it by bringing along this collapsible camping stove. Crafted from stainless steel and aluminum alloy, this robust little stove assembles in a matter of seconds and can boil 1 liter of water in as little as 2.5 minutes.

Avoid lawsuits by getting your customers to take notice when the floor is wet by placing this banana peel safety cone on the floor. It features a comical banana design that’s up to 22 times more noticeable than the common A-frame floor sign.

Save a bundle on batteries by keeping them juiced up using this automatic motorized battery recharger. Designed for both AA and AAA batteries, the design lets you stack the batteries without worrying about polarity and it can charge four batteries at once.

Impale your target with sniper-like accuracy when you go shooting with the tactical crossbow. This unique weapon features an ultra-stiff, split limb design for exceptional power and durability, in addition to an adjustable vertical grip that allows for better accuracy.

Leave those leaky brass spigots behind once and for all by upgrading your home with the instant hook-up water hose. It features a simple and leak-proof design that protects against sub-zero freeze and allows you to hook up your hose with a simple twist.

Protect your smartphone’s delicate screen from cracks and scratches using this case and screen protector. This transparent shock absorbent case comes with an IPT nano shield screen protector that’s 50x stronger than tempered glass.

Turn your supermarket-quality slab of meat into a five-star delicacy by marinating it in this steak aging sauce. Just one tablespoon per pound before cooking is all that you need to make your steak taste like an aged cut that is straight out of a high-end steakhouse.

Stay cool and hydrated while you’re spending the day outdoors by plopping your tired butt down on this built-in cooler folding chair. Apart from a comfy place to sit, the bottom is outfitted with a small cooler ideal for keeping your beverages icy cold.

Improve your Johnson’s curbside appeal by keeping it looking magnificent using the gentleman’s penis grooming kit. No matter what pubic style you have in mind, the specialized tools found in this unique kit will help you make your manscaping vision a reality.

Throw the best pizza party your friends have ever seen  by using the recipes found inside this TMNT pizza cookbook. You’ll join Donatello, Rafael, Leonardo, and Michelangelo as they show you how to prepare their favorite pies like New York Style pepperoni pizza.

Handle a variety of jobs without having to go into your toolbox by reaching for this belt buckle multi-tool. This handy buckle fits belts up to 1-3/8″ wide and opens up into a useful little multi-tool equipped with everything from a pair of pliers to a pair of scissors and a knife.

Take sand art to mind-blowing levels as you light up the night with glow in the dark sand. The glowing sand comes in four different colors that help you create amazing works of art everyone will enjoy all night long as the sand glows for hours.

Turn up at your next house party in the most baller way imaginable by dousing your guests with the champagne machine gun. Simply load up a magnum-sized bottle, give it a few shakes, and shoot out a 23 foot long stream of your favorite bubbly.

Pay homage to the incomparable thespian known in the mortal realm as Nicolas Cage by passing the time with this incredibly fun activity book. Inside you’ll find an illustrated homage made up of games, puzzles, and coloring pages that will please the One True God.

Get your pooch to stop climbing on the furniture once and for all by purchasing the dog cave bed. This oversized and insanely comfortable bed completely envelops Rex so that he can burrow in its soft innards – ensuring he’ll never jump on the couch again.

Going outside is overrated. By getting atop this virtual reality exercise bike you’ll be able to stay fit without having to go outside and breathe in fresh air. It’s compatible with PS VR, Oculus Rift, and HTC Vive headsets, and comes with a slew of VR arcade games.

Say goodbye to unevenly cooked campfire treats by grilling them up using this marshmallow roasting fishing pole. Simply place your marshmallows or hot dogs on the stainless steel frame and gently lower it to the ideal height using the included fishing pole.

Get an exhilarating cardio workout while you’re getting your work done by sitting on this exercise bicycle desk. It features an adjustable seat, a non-slip surface on the desk, and specially positioned massage rollers to help you type comfortably while you workout.

Achieve total serenity without meditation by creating gravity-defying patterns on this magnetized zen garden. This small square garden combines natural magnetic sand along with three polished Hematite rocks so you can create a variety of abstract designs.

Give boredom a swift kick in the ass by gathering your friends and family around for a night of wholesome family fun. Under the spinner lid Game Night In A Can contains 30 original family friendly games like creative contests, team challenges, and games of skill.

Now you can transform any plain wall into a chalkboard just like you had in school! Simply apply the chalkboard wall paint like you would a traditional wall paint and when it dries you’ll have a genuine chalkboard to write and draw on.

If you’re constantly uncovering yourself from the bed sheets because you can’t maintain a cool temperature then you need a bed fan. This bed fan will quietly disperse hot air under the sheets and keep you cool all night long so you can get a good night’s rest.

Experience the Midas high every time you light up with these 24 karat gold rolling papers. Perfect for the high rollers, these functional gold rolling papers will take your smoke sessions to a whole new level of class as you inhale actual gold into your lungs.

Fill up zip-lock bags without spilling a single drop by using this hands-free food storage bag holder. It features adjustable arms that hold the ends of the plastic bag upright so that you can easily fill them up without needing any extra assistance.

Perfect your putting game by fine-tuning your shot with help from this golf putt smartphone camera stand. This handcrafted wood and steel stand positions your smartphone at the ideal angle so that you can record and analyze your shots afterwards.

Fall in love all over again as you rediscover your spouse’s hopes, worries, and dreams using these conversation starter cards for husbands and wives. Each card features a question and an accompanying verse or quote intended to spark a lively conversation.

Bring a touch of modern sophistication to your living room by illuminating your home with this circular LED chandelier. This stylish piece is composed of three circular LED strips that can be adjusted and placed at different heights.

Drown out your sexually deviant thoughts in a matter of seconds with the “Images You Shouldn’t Masturbate To” book! Jam packed with eighty pages of boner subsiding pictures, this unusual book is a clean and wholesome way to pass the time.

Achieve true gender equality by peeing while standing up with this female urination funnel. Simply place the plastic pink funnel by your hoo-ha and watch as you break gender barriers as you perform the glorious act of urinating while standing.

See if you’ve got what it takes to survive when disaster strikes by sitting down for a round of Escape The Room. Players have an hour to escape dangerous scenarios like a nuclear countdown, a prison break, a virus outbreak, and an Aztec temple.

Stop paying for expensive therapy sessions and start releasing your anger naturally without frightening your co-workers with the Japanese shouting vase. The vase drowns out your screams and shouts so that you can discreetly mouth off obscenities as loud as you want.

Give your tequila shots an irresistible gourmet twist by serving them in these Himalayan salt shot glasses. Carved from high quality Himalayan pink salt, they have a pleasant salty taste and a gorgeous rose quartz appearance.

Send your little adrenaline junkies spinning through the air by placing this hanging spin ring in your yard. It features a hollow circular structure that provides a secure place to sit and is designed to hold up to 300 pounds so that four kids can ride at once.

titleEN: But… You’re A Horse Romance Novel
content: From the online mischief maker that gave us the “knock knock hijack” and “hotel graffiti” comes But….You’re A Horse romance novel. A varied collections of gags, anecdotes, and pranks that have nothing whatsoever to do with the cover.

Don’t just make it rain at the strip club – make it tropical storm – with this quick dispensing cash cannon! Built for speed and performance, this baby will shoot your entire life savings all over the dance floor in record time as you make the worst decision of your life!

Get serious about caring for your precious fermented grape juice by storing it inside the wine preservation system. Built to the highest of standards, the vacuum technology keeps open wine bottles fresh for days at the ideal drinking temperature.

Get some sweet lovin’ on demand with the ring for sex bell. This naughty little bell comes painted in a provocative red hue and displays the words “ring for sex” in white – making this a great and fun gift for any couple.

Keep your precious paws safe while handling hot objects in the kitchen using these bear claw oven mitts. These whimsy oven mitts are made from insulated cotton along with heat resistant silicone to provide superior protection.

Give your little one’s bedroom a stellar touch using this hanging solar system mobile. This scientific and decorative accent comes adorned with beautifully decorated planets that orbit around a sun on a thin frame that creates the illusion they’re floating.

Make perfect restaurant quality flapjacks right in your own kitchen using the Flippin’ Fantastic pancake flipper. Made of non-stick silicone, this oven safe device allows you to pour seven perfectly circular pancakes at once and flip them in one fluid motion.

Craft one of a kind Easter decorations and ornaments in a snap using the egg art robot. The robot is an open-source device designed to draw intricate patterns on all kinds of spherical or egg-shaped objects from the size of a ping pong to a grapefruit.

Slash through those rotting zombie corpses like hot butter with the forearm blade sword. Constructed from anodized stainless steel, there’s no post apocalyptic scenario you won’t be able to fight your way out of – except hunger, dehydration, and crippling depression.

Construct your army of insects with the Creepy Crawlers machine. This nostalgic toy of the ’90s allows you to transform slime into colorful bugs in no time using the included three detailing tips, bottles of plasti-goop, detailing pen, and cooling tray.

Feel like a giant come harvest time by planting tons of these mini watermelon cucumber seeds in your garden. These Mexican miniature watermelon seeds come to maturity in about 60 days and produce tiny 1-2″ fruits shaped like watermelons.

The Pico C personal craft beer brewing machine is the solution for anyone who’s ever wanted to brew but didn’t know how. This app assisted appliance simplifies the entire process so that you can brew a fresh 5L batch with the push of a button.

Bask in the glorious scent of freedom as you light up the freshly signed divorce papers candle. Nothing  will capture the rich parchment of the legal document declaring the death of your marriage quite like sparking up this custom made candle!

Stock up your junk food pantry in a single shot by purchasing the ultimate snacks variety box. This massive package comes stuffed with all kinds of sugary and delicious treats like cookies, granola bars, chips, chocolates, and other candy.

Keep yourself well hydrated on your next hunting excursion by bringing along this MOLLE backpack cooler. It comes with padded shoulder straps for added comfort, MOLLE webbing, and insulated inner walls that will retain cold for days.

Give your tired feet the royal treatment by keeping them warm in these Disney princess socks. These lively socks are made from 100% soft cotton and are styled to look like iconic Disney princesses like Ariel, Jasmine, Snow White, and Cinderella.

Give your next Taco Tuesday some prehistoric flair with this triceratops taco holder. This small dinosaur is made from food safe polypropylene plastic and comes with a hollowed out backside designed to neatly hold your taco in place.

If you wear sunglasses at night you’re a douche. However, if you wear the glow in the dark sunglasses at night you’ll be the life of the party. Each pair features a vibrant neon frame available in every color under the sun – great for enhancing those party drugs.

titleEN: Flowers Of The Month Subscription Box
content: Keep your home looking lively year round by signing up for the flowers of the month subscription box. Each month you’ll receive a beautiful bouquet of colorful blooms along with care instructions to ensure the longest possible vase life.

Kick up your next foosball tournament’s glam factor by playing on this eye-catching LED foosball table. The table comes lined with a thin LED strip around the entire playing field that gives the foosball men and playing field a custom glow.

Make it look as if your hand is being devoured by a Xenomorph when you grab a cookie out of this Alien egg ceramic cookie jar. It’s expertly styled to look exactly like a Xenomorph egg – complete with a cool facehugger lid.

Experience your favorite meal in a whole new and exciting way by sitting down to play the Sushi Go! card game. In this thrilling and fast paced strategic thinking game players quickly pass around sushi dish cards in order to form the highest scoring combination.

Turn heads anywhere you go by riding around with a big ol’ pair of dangling testicles hanging off the back of your seat. The eye-catching design of this bicycle light coupled with the impossibly bright neon pink glow will ensure you get noticed by drivers while riding.

Make your mouth water every time you walk into your room by dressing your bed up in this eye-catching cheese pizza bed spread. This novelty bed spread transforms your bed into the most comfortable and delicious looking slice of pizza in the world.

Teach yourself about tha O.G. who started it all by reading up Tha Holy Bibizzle. You’ll be able to educate yourself on things like tha crucifizzle of Jizzle, Adam n Eve in tha weed garden of Eden, creation of tha heavens n tha ghetto, the tower of Babel, n much mo.

Craft the ultimate Burning Man getup by incorporating the sound activated light up wires into your eccentric ensemble. The wires come in various eye-catching hues and glow bright while pulsating to the beat of the music and creating amazing visual effects.

Deliver stingy missiles of pain with deadly precision by firing them off using the rubber band gun. Hand carved from solid oak, this compact piece makes shooting and reloading a breeze so that you can unleash a barrage of rubbery pain at a moment’s notice.

Avoid having to handle old Rex’s stinky turds by strapping on this poop collecting dog harness before his next walk. The harness conveniently places a small bag right under your dog’s business end so the poop instantly drops into the bag instead of the ground.

Transform your home’s plain walls into action packed levels using these Super Mario Bros. wall decals. These easy to apply decals come styled exactly like elements from the classic Nintendo game so that you can recreate scenes from your favorite levels.

Buy, sell, and trade your way around the universe by sitting around the table for a rousing game of Rick and Morty Monopoly. You and five of your closest glip glops will take an interdimensional journey as everyone makes their way around the game board.

Give your plain dogs a delicious gourmet touch using this spiral hot dog slicer. This easy to operate utensil slices up your plump dog into a meaty spiral so that it cooks evenly inside and out while it’s roasting over your grill top.

When Kevin Cotter’s wife left him, she took everything except her wedding dress. In Kevin’s infinite wisdom, he took it upon himself to find 101 uses for his ex-wife’s wedding dress – with everything from using it as a car sponge to a fishing net in this hilarious book.

Avoid having your headphones slip off in the middle of your favorite song by upgrading to these reshapable custom fit earphones. These reasonably priced earphones offer great sound and can be shaped to the contours of your ear for the perfect fit.

Look like a Viking warlord while you’re sipping your premium roast by drinking it from this stainless steel skull coffee mug. This horrifyingly awesome tankard comes with a highly detailed 3D skull design complemented by an ornate stainless steel insert.

Dazzle bystanders everywhere and make their jaws drop with the magician’s smoke kit. With the strike of the hand, you’ll be able to instantly create a cloud of smoke out of thin air just like a mighty sorcerer. Your muggle friends will definitely be impressed.

Bring a little old school charm to your modern setup with this retro typewriter inspired mechanical keyboard. This water and dust resistant keyboard features typewriter style rounded keys with a chrome plated body and key caps.

Make lunch time more appealing for picky little eaters by dicing meals using this bite sized food cutter. It’s made from a high-grade food-safe material designed to instantly cut your food into 12 little squares that can be eaten up individually.

Get your caffeine fix on a warm summer day by using this cold brew coffee maker. It’s built with stainless steel parts for maximum durability, gives your beverage a rich full-bodied flavor, and makes up to 14 servings per batch.

titleEN: Inflatable Ride On Bull Pool Toy
content: Grab your bathing suit and see if you have what it takes to tame the wildest beast at the aquatic rodeo by hopping on this inflatable ride on bull pool toy. It’s designed using photo-realistic printing technology and made from durable gauge vinyl.

Keeping your home neat and tidy is easier than ever with this home cleaning tool docking station. This compact docking station houses a broom head, sponge mop head, and microfiber mop head that you can easily attach to the versatile and sturdy pole.

Everyday is Easter when this colorful and talented Easter egg laying hen comes to town. With the push of a button, this fluffy yellow hen begins to sing a parody of the iconic “Whoomp (There It is)” song as she dances and lays colorful plastic eggs.

Roughing it in the great outdoors just got a bit easier thanks to the pop up tent. This high quality tent comes pre-assembled and pops open in a snap, leaving you with more time for the important tasks like foraging for berries, fishing at the lake, and gathering firewood.

Get a taste of what life as a space explorer is like by snacking on some astronaut freeze dried ice cream. This out of this world treat is freeze dried into compact bars and vacuum sealed in special foil pouches so you can enjoy them without creating a sticky mess.

Wow onlookers with a technicolor light show on your special day by walking down the aisle in this luminous fiber optic wedding dress. This visually captivating dress is woven from a high tech fiber optic fabric that can light up in four beautiful and vibrant hues.

This toilet seat pedal is a brilliant solution to end fights over leaving the toilet seat up. Simply step on the pedal to lift up the toilet seat, then once you’re finished, remove your foot and the toilet seat will slowly drop back down.

Have an adventurous day on the high seas when you and 9 of your best friends hop aboard this giant stand up paddle board. It’s made from military-grade PVC and drop-stitch construction that can hold up to 1550 pounds at a time.
